activities.en: Developed client-facing web applications using React and .NET backend

activities.en: Integrated third-party APIs including payment gateways and mapping services
activities.es: Integré APIs de terceros incluyendo pasarelas de pago y servicios de mapas

activities.en: Participated in agile ceremonies and contributed to sprint planning
activities.es: Participé en ceremonias ágiles y contribuí a la planificación de sprints

activities.en: Wrote unit and integration tests improving code coverage from 40% to 78%
